name: The 16th International Conference on Management, Economics and Humanities
content: The 16th International Conference on Management, Economics, and Humanities is scheduled for June 12-14, 2025, in Vienna, Austria. This event aims to bring together academia, researchers, and scholars to exchange information, share experiences, and present their research findings across both specialized and interdisciplinary fields. It offers a valuable platform for networking, idea sharing, and presenting research to a global audience. Attendees are encouraged to discuss the latest innovations, trends, and practical challenges in these fields. The conference will address topics such as the effects of globalization on manufacturing output, government service quality, and youth employment and unemployment in the digital economy. Distinguished academics, researchers, scholars, industry experts, and participants from the public and private sectors will be present. Donâ€™t miss this important event in Vienna. Looking to establish your reputation in the academic and research community? Getting published in indexed academic journals is crucial for advancing your academic career! The conference adheres to strict anti-plagiarism policies, checking every submission for plagiarism using Crossref Similarity Check powered by iThenticate. Seize the excellent chance to explore a new city while gaining a top-notch educational experience. Important Dates to Remember: Paper Submission Deadline: May 23, 2025 Registration Deadline: June 2, 2025
